mapper.insert: INSERT INTO internsc.tb_ctn ( tpl_cd, src_cd, img_grp_id, ctn_nm, dsp_st_dt, dsp_end_dt, ctn_div, dsp_yn, cmt_yn, cst_yn, pop_msg, view_cnt, reg_dt, mod_dt, use_yn ) VALUES ( #{tplCd}, #{srcCd}, #{imgGrpId}, #{ctnNm}, #{dspStDt}, #{dspEndDt}, #{ctnDiv}, #{dspYn}, #{cmtYn}, #{cstYn}, #{popMsg}, 0, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'Y' )
